ComicInfo.Summary:
Tensions rise within the Serenity crew as they debate what to do with the mysterious relics hidden within Requiem.
But before they can refuel, a new villain arrives to threaten the crew and their enigmatic hosts. And despite Zoe’s distrust of River and reluctance to leave Emma behind, Kaylee reminds them they have a job to do…
